# Neutron capture gammas for Ni-64 generated by sums.py from data obtained from
# NNDC capture gamma tables at http://www.nndc.bnl.gov/capgam/indexbyn.html
#
# Number of gammas in a decay chain limited to 4
# Hand tuned.
#
# First column lists probability for decay scheme; second column lists number of gammas
# in decay scheme; gamma energies (in keV) are then listed separated by a space.
#
